content: Which English rock band, formed in London in 1962, is considered one of the most influential bands in history with hits like "Paint It Black" and "Angie"?

I believe the English rock band you're referring to is The Rolling Stones. They were formed in London in 1962 and have indeed had a profound influence on music history. Some of their iconic hits include "Paint It Black" and "Angie." The Rolling Stones are known for their blues-rock sound and have been active for several decades, continuing to tour and release music.他们的
